item.title: Why is Afcons Infrastructure Ltd falling/rising?
item.description: On 12-Jan, Afcons Infrastructure Ltd’s stock price fell sharply to ₹355.65, marking a 2.11% decline and hitting a new 52-week and all-time low of ₹354.35. This drop reflects a continuation of a downward trend driven by weak financial performance, poor debt servicing ability, and significant promoter share pledging, which have collectively weighed on investor sentiment.
